00080 @interface SpaceManager : NSObject
00081 {
00082         
00083 @protected
00084         /* our chipmunk space! */
00085         cpSpace                 *_space;
00086         
00087         /* Internal devices (dev: Consider revamping) */
00088         NSMutableArray  *_invocations;
00089 
00090         /* Helpful Shapes/Bodies */
00091         cpShape                 *topWall,*bottomWall,*rightWall,*leftWall;
00092         
00093         /* Number of steps (across dt) perform on each step call */
00094         int             _steps;
00095         
00096         /* The dt used last within step */
00097         cpFloat _lastDt;
00098         
00099         /* If constant dt used, then this accumulates left over */
00100         cpFloat _timeAccumulator;
00101         
00102         /* hack to fix rehashing one static */
00103         BOOL _rehashNextStep;
00104         
00105         /* Options:
00106                 -cleanupBodyDependencies will also free contraints connected to a free'd shape
00107                 -constraintCleanupDelegate is the delegate that will be called when the above variable is true
00108                 -iterateStatic will call _iterateFunc on static shapes
00109                 -rehashStaticEveryStep will rehash static shapes at the end of every step
00110                 -iterateFunc; default will update cocosnodes for pos and rotation
00111                 -constantDt; set this to a non-zero number to always step the simulation with that dt
00112         */
00113         BOOL                                                    _cleanupBodyDependencies;
00114         id<cpConstraintCleanupDelegate> _constraintCleanupDelegate;
00115         BOOL                                                    _iterateStatic;
00116         BOOL                                                    _rehashStaticEveryStep;
00117         cpSpaceHashIterator                             _iterateFunc;
00118         cpFloat                                                 _constantDt;
00119 }
